title: Sister of the Hedge & Other Stories
description: In the world war against the Elf King, what is the cost of victory ... a dryad vigilante in Tuscon fights an enemy more dangerous than any her own nature ... a grim look at the true cost of Sleeping Beauty's curse. This collection features six of Jim C. Hines' more serious OF THE HEDGEIN THE LINE OF DUTYHEART OF ASHBLOODLINESIMAGES OF DEATHOURS TO FIGHT FOREach story includes an afterword from the author.
author: Jim C. Hines
